displayName.text: The City College of New York

formattedAddress: 160 Convent Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA
adrFormatAddress: 160 Convent Ave, New York, NY 10031, USA

editorialSummary.text: Founded in 1847, this Harlem public school is known for its liberal arts & engineering programs.

originalText.text: I love the location of CCNY in the New York on Hudson edge, it has big parks and grounds compared to other colleges which are like just look like any other buildings not like a college.

text.text: I love the location of CCNY in the New York on Hudson edge, it has big parks and grounds compared to other colleges which are like just look like any other buildings not like a college.

originalText.text: It is very much like a community college. It's very diverse, tolerant, peaceful and affordable for middle class students. ðŸ˜ŽIn fact, many well-known people, such as Woody Allen and Colin Powell, have gone to this college. Plus, there's a lot of guidance involved for those whom wish to find their passions and study abroad. So, for those who wish to explore, this is definitely worth it.

originalText.text: Admission office assistant is really friendly, she gave me great tips and helped me a lot .

originalText.text: It is the worst college ever. Professor are not good at all especially in the science department. It rare to find a good professor. Classes that deal with any science major consist of 80to 90 students in lectures. Most of the students donâ€™t attend. Professor only take attendance on the first couple day of the semester, other than that attending classes doesnâ€™t matter. Exams worth all your grade average, even if you have A in the lab. Honestly it is hard to pass a class in this college. It is a mess, they all care about the money that come out from the student/ loans and etc. departments control over your schedule, you always all find an issue with cuny schedule. Most of the departments but classes at the same time. I never been a full time student due to to this issue and also because the professors are not good, they are not teaching, they only saying blah blah blah that never ends. And You go out of the class confusing. Donâ€™t wast your time here. I wasted a year in my life because of this mess

originalText.text: The original City College of New York was founded as the fist pvblic institution in the United States. At one time it was known as Harvard of the poor. Its castle like Neo Goth style makes you feel like in a Harry Poter flick. Sit on the laws and enjoy the birds. All the roads within the college are open to the pvblic and the views are great!!!
